channel.title: Pablo Fonseca
channel.description: If I had eight ours to chop down a tree, I'd spend six hours sharpening my ax

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description:
Welcome, this blog is a place to share information about web development, workflow, life (why not?) and more stuff.

I hope you like the contents that is going to be posted here, if you have any contribuition, please write it down in the comments bellow.

Thanks you!
